description: Emissions in tCO~2~ per MWh of primary energy (e.g. methane has 0.2 tCO~2~/MWh~thermal~).
Color for plotting (e.g. `matplotlib` [named colors](https://matplotlib.org/stable/gallery/color/named_colors.html) or hexadecimal color codes like "#AB9812")
Descriptive name for statistics and visualisations (e.g. "Natural Gas" for carrier `gas`)
Maximum new installed capacity per investment period
Maximum capacity ratio for new installed capacity per investment period
